name: Respect
description: Following the rise of Aretha Franklin's career from a child singing in her father's church's choir to her international superstardom, RESPECT is the remarkable true story of the music icon's journey to find her voice.

review.author: educatexan
review.heading: Mostly bits and pieces
review.reviewBody: The film was more of a collection of vignettes than a complete story. It felt very disjointed. Characters appeared and disappeared, and stories were left incomplete. It was difficult to determine Aretha's motives during life changes.

keywords: soul music,recording session,recording studio,martin luther king jr. character,detroit michigan
